00028 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #ifndef __EBI_LCD_H
00030 #define __EBI_LCD_H
00031 
00032 #ifdef __cplusplus
00033  extern "C" {
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037 #include "ht32_board.h"
00038 #include "lcd.h"
00039 
00040 /** @addtogroup Utilities
00041   * @{
00042   */
00043 
00044 /** @addtogroup Common
00045   * @{
00046   */
00047 
00048 /** @addtogroup EBI_LCD EBI_LCD
00049   * @{
00050   */
00051 
00052 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00053 #define LCD_08_BIT_MODE               (8)
00054 #define LCD_16_BIT_MODE               (16)
00055 
00056 #define SPIDUALOUT_WITH_EBI_8BIT_MODE (0)
00057 // Note: Connect RS to EBI_An if you want to use SPI dual output with EBI 8-bit mode (For default RS is EBI_A0)
00058 
00059 #ifndef LCD_BIT_MODE
00060 #define LCD_BIT_MODE                  (LCD_16_BIT_MODE)
00061 #endif
00062 
00063 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00064 /** @defgroup EBI_LCD_Exported_Types EBI LCD exported types
00065   * @{
00066   */
00067 #if (LCD_BIT_MODE == LCD_16_BIT_MODE)
00068   typedef struct
00069   {
00070     vu16 EBI_LCD_REG;
00071     #if (LCD_EBI_RS_ADDR_PIN)
00072     vu16 _RESERVED[(0x1ul << LCD_EBI_RS_ADDR_PIN) - 1];
00073     #endif
00074     vu16 EBI_LCD_RAM;
00075   } EBI_LCD_TypeDef;
00076 #elif ((LCD_BIT_MODE == LCD_08_BIT_MODE) && (SPIDUALOUT_WITH_EBI_8BIT_MODE == 1))
00077   typedef struct
00078   {
00079     vu8 EBI_LCD_REG;
00080     #if (LCD_EBI_RS1_ADDR_PIN)
00081     vu8 _RESERVED[(0x1ul << LCD_EBI_RS1_ADDR_PIN) - 1];
00082     #endif
00083     vu8 EBI_LCD_RAM;
00084   } EBI_LCD_TypeDef;
00085 #else
00086   typedef struct
00087   {
00088     vu8 EBI_LCD_REG;
00089     #if (LCD_EBI_RS_ADDR_PIN)
00090     vu8 _RESERVED[(0x1ul << LCD_EBI_RS_ADDR_PIN) - 1];
00091     #endif
00092     vu8 EBI_LCD_RAM;
00093   } EBI_LCD_TypeDef;
00094 #endif
00095 /**
00096   * @}
00097   */
00098 
00099 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00100 /** @defgroup EBI_LCD_Exported_Constants EBI LCD exported constants
00101   * @{
00102   */
00103 #define LCD_Bank_ADDR             0x60000000
00104 #define EBI_LCD                  ((EBI_LCD_TypeDef *) LCD_Bank_ADDR)
00105

00107   * @}

00110 /* Exported functions --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00111 /** @defgroup EBI_LCD_Exported_Functions EBI LCD exported functions
00112   * @{
00113   */
00114 void LCD_Init(void);
00115 void LCD_Config(void);
00116 void LCD_WriteReg(u32 LCD_Reg_Index, u32 LCD_Reg_Value);
00117 u16 LCD_ReadReg(u32 LCD_Reg_Index);
00118 void LCD_StarterSet(u32 X_Location, u32 Y_Location);
00119 void LCD_WriteRAMPrior(void);
00120 void LCD_WriteRAM(u32 RGB_Set);
00121 void LCD_Clear(u16 Color);
00122 void LCD_BackColorSet(u16 Color);
00123 void LCD_TextColorSet(u16 Color);
00124 void LCD_CharDisplay(u32 Line_Num, u32 Column, u32 Ascii);
00125 void LCD_DisplayOff(void);
00126 void LCD_DisplayOn(void);
00127 void LCD_StringLineDisplay(u32 Line_Num, char *Sptr);
00128 void LCD_CharDraw(u32 X_Location, u32 Y_Location, u16 *Cptr);
00129 void LCD_LineDraw(u32 X_Location, u32 Y_Location, u32 Length, u32 Direction);
00130 void LCD_CircleDraw(u32 X_Location, u32 Y_Location, u32 Radius);
00131 void LCD_RectDraw(u32 X_Location, u32 Y_Location, u32 Height, u32 Width);
00132 void LCD_PicDraw(u8 X_Location, u16 Y_Location, u8 Height, u16 Width, uc8 *Pptr);
00133 void LCD_WriteRAMWord(u32 RGB_Set);
00134 void LCD_SetDisplayArea(u16 Column, u16 Page, u16 Height, u16 Width);
